Name: rote²
About the game: rote² is a game that variates traditional rhythm games. The note falls on the six lines, and you have to press the keyboard when the notes touch the bottom of the line! Notes can fall across several lines. In that case, it is processed by pressing only one of the lines across the note. rote² is a rhythm game based on user-made custom levels. Subscribe and download the custom levels in Steam Workshop, and play them in-game! You can make your own levels in the in-game level editor.
